column2: "Na Moses kasaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba ebusuakuw ebusuakuw mu etsitsir no dɛ
column3: Iyi nye adze a EWURADZE ahyɛ."
anaa ɔka ntam dze nkyehoma kyekyer ne kra a
column4: mma ommbu n'asɛm do; ɔnyɛ dɛ mbrɛ dza ofi n'anomu nyinara tse."

column2: "Eso sɛ ɔbaa bi bɔ anohoba ma EWURADZE
column3: na ɔdze nkyehoma kyekyer noho wɔ n'egya fie
nye ne nkyehoma a ɔdze akyekyer ne kra
column4: na n'egya ennsiw no kwam a: ɔno n'anohoba nyinara ntsim hɔ
column5: na nkyehoma biara a ɔdze akyekyer ne kra no ntsim hɔ."

column2: "Sɛ da a n'egya bɛtse no osiw no kwan dze a; ɔno n'anohoba
column3: anaa ne nkyehoma a ɔdze akyekyer ne kra no mu biara rinntsim hɔ: na EWURADZE dze bɛkyɛ no

column4: anaa n'anosɛm hurutuhurutu a ɔdze akyekyer ne kra no

column3: na da a ɔtsee no oennsiw no kwan a: ɔno n'anohoba no ntsim hɔ na ne nkyehoma a ɔdze akyekyer ne kra no ntsim hɔ."

column2: "Sɛ no kun siw no kwan da a ɔtsee no dze a; ɔno ɔmma n'anohoba a ɔwɔ no do
column3: nye n'anosɛm hurutuhurutu a ɔdze akyekyer ne kra no nyɛ kwa: na EWURADZE dze bɛkyɛr no."
anaa nyia woegyaa no awar no n'anohoba dze
column4: mekyerɛ adze biara a ɔdze kyekyer ne kra no

column2: "Na sɛ ɔwɔ no kun fie na ɔbɔɔ anohoba
column3: anaa ɔdze ntam dze nkyehoma kyekyeer ne kra
column7: na oennsiw no kwan a; ɔno n'anohoba nyinara tsim hɔ
column8: na nkyehoma biara a ɔdze akyekyer ne kra no tsim hɔ."

column2: "Sɛ no kun no ma ɔyɛ kwa wɔ da a ɔtsee no dze a; ɔno biribiara a ofii n'anomu do wɔ n'anohoba ho
column3: anaa ne kra nkyehoma ho no
column4: rinntsim hɔ: no kun no ama ayɛ kwa; na EWURADZE dze bɛkyɛ no."

column3: nye ntam biara a wɔdze brɛ ɔkra adze no
column5: anaa no kun na ɔma ɔyɛ kwa."

column2: "Na sɛ no kun yɛ no komm koraa fi da to da a; ɔno otsintsim n'anohoba nyinara
column3: anaa ne nkyehoma nyinara a ɔwɔ no do no: oetsintsim no
column4: osiandɛ ɔyɛɛ no komm wɔ da a ɔtsee no."

column2: "Sɛ ɔatse no ɔkyɛr ana ekyir no ɔama ayɛ kwa dze a; ɔno kun no nsoa yer no n'emumuyɛ."
"Iyinom nye ahyɛdze a EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses dɛ ɔnda banyin nye ne yer ntamu
column3: ɔnda egya nye ne babaa a ɔwɔ ne nkataasiaber mu
